name: Bouncing Balls: Color Ball
description:
Welcome to Bouncing Balls, the classical gameplay but creative. Bouncing Balls has simple gameplay and rule, that make Bouncing Balls suitable for all ages!
There are two things you need to know to start playing:
1) Pay attention to the color of the container.
2) Attention time!
In Bouncing Balls, you need try your best to collect balls that have the same color as the container. Because every cleared ball will give you extra time. At the same time, the more balls you clear, the more points you can get.
Collect the balls you want and bounce the balls you don't want! Come on! Get a higher score in a limited time!
Features:
New gameplay
Simple rule
Suitable for all ages
Colorful balls
Please enjoy Bouncing Balle free! Download now!
